title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 3 - How to Plug the End of a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Plugging the end of a lay flat header pipe
subtasks: Verify pipe diameter and ensure connector, fitting, and plug match
If one-piece plug unavailable, create a custom plug using multiple fittings
Wrap Teflon tape around the white threaded cap
Screw the white threaded cap into the gray barbed fitting
Tighten the barbed fitting using a pipe wrench
Place a clamp on the lay flat pipe
Insert the barbed cap into the end of the pipe, ensuring a snug fit
Lubricate the connector with a full-grade lubricant if necessary
Push the clamp to the top of the fitting
Use a flathead screwdriver to tighten the clamp
Prepare to attach drip tape to the header pipe
